definitions: moving one's hand to and fro in greeting or as a signal
shortDefinitions: moving one's hand to and fro in greeting or as signal

definitions: moving to and fro with a swaying motion while remaining fixed to one point
shortDefinitions: moving to and fro with swaying motion while remaining fixed to one point

definitions: (of hair) growing with a slight curl

examples.text: thick, waving gray hair sprouted back from his forehead
